overview: A news bulletin like you'd like to see more often! Stay calm - it's just a distraction! The 8 o'clock news reinvented by Cadinot.  In five raw reports, 16 gorgeous chickens burst onto your screen. Enough to shatter the mind of the strongest viewer!  Hostages: In a school, four pupils are held prisoner by a sexual headcase!  Two experts tap the phone to listen in on some disturbing goings-on.  The traffic warden who accepts payment in kind instead of a fine - and the young offender who is all for this method of payment!  In an emergency, do not confuse giving help with interference!  10% consumers: the technicians try out natural fats in a very localised and special tasting session....  You'll be glued to the screen by the horny action, the derision and the humour!
title: Les Minets de l'info
